comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: The camera is facing north.  The picture most likely was taken from San Francisco Church bell tower.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: On the lower right border is typed "ES PROPIEDAD ASEGURADA (copy-righted). NOV. 23, 1907. G. B. WAITE FOTO," which seems the date when picture was taken or published. In The Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs, Detroit Publishing Co. collection, you can find a picture taken from the plane of the street, by William Henry Jackson between 1880 and 1897, at the crossing of San Francisco and Prisciliano Sánchez Streets. www.loc.gov/pictures/item/det1994003370/PP/ Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon dr.robertoduarte@hotmail.com
